alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:01AM CDT until July 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GARVIN...WESTERN SEMINOLE...SOUTHEASTERN CLEVELAND...NORTHWESTERN PONTOTOC...POTTAWATOMIE AND SOUTHEASTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 900 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Prague to 5 miles south of Maud to near Byars, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Ada, Seminole, Tecumseh, Pauls Valley, Wynnewood, Stratford, Konawa, Maysville, Byng, Maud, Earlsboro, Paoli, Bowlegs, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Byars, St. Louis, and Rosedale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
